verses.verse: Ahaz <S%H271><s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> but he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> like <S%H1732>David<s%> his father: <S%H1><s%>

Moreover <S%H1931>he<s%> burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> and <S%H1197>burnt<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> in the <S%H784>fire,<s%> after the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had cast <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> also and burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places,<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree.<s%>

Wherefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria;<s%> and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and carried <S%H7617>away<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> multitude <S%H4480>of<s%> them <S%H7633>captives,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%> And he was <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H5221>smote<s%> him with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter.<s%>

For <S%H6492>Pekah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> which were <S%H3605>all<s%> valiant <S%H1121>men;<s%> <S%H2428><s%> because they had <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And <S%H2147>Zichri,<s%> a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H5840>Azrikam<s%> the <S%H5057>governor<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> that was <S%H4932>next<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> carried away <S%H7617>captive<s%> of their <S%H4480>brethren<s%> <S%H251><s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> <S%H802>women,<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and took also <S%H962>away<s%> <S%H1571><s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them, and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

But a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H5752>Oded:<s%> and he went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> was <S%H2534>wroth<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> he hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and ye have <S%H2026>slain<s%> them in a <S%H2197>rage<s%> that reacheth <S%H5060>up<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H559>purpose<s%> to keep <S%H3533>under<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H5650>bondmen<s%> and <S%H8198>bondwomen<s%> unto you: but are there <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you, <S%H7535>even<s%> with <S%H859>you,<s%> <S%H819>sins<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God?<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> me therefore, and <S%H7725>deliver<s%> the <S%H7633>captives<s%> again, <S%H834>which<s%> ye have taken <S%H7617>captive<s%> of your <S%H4480>brethren:<s%> <S%H251><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> you.

Then <S%H376>certain<s%> of the <S%H4480>heads<s%> <S%H7218><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3076>Johanan,<s%> <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4919>Meshillemoth,<s%> and <S%H3169>Jehizkiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%> and <S%H6021>Amasa<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2311>Hadlai,<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them that <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H6635>war,<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> bring <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7633>captives<s%> <S%H2008>hither:<s%> for <S%H3588>whereas<s%> we have offended <S%H819>against<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> already, <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H559>intend<s%> to <S%H3254>add<s%> more <S%H5921>to<s%> our <S%H2403>sins<s%> and <S%H5921>to<s%> our <S%H819>trespass:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> our <S%H819>trespass<s%> is <S%H7227>great,<s%> and there is <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

So the armed <S%H2502>men<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7633>captives<s%> and the <S%H961>spoil<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5344>expressed<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H2388>took<s%> the <S%H7633>captives,<s%> and <S%H4480>with<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H4636>naked<s%> among them, and <S%H3847>arrayed<s%> them, and <S%H5274>shod<s%> them, and gave them to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8248>drink,<s%> and <S%H5480>anointed<s%> them, and <S%H5095>carried<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3782>feeble<s%> of them upon <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> the city of palm <S%H5899>trees,<s%> <S%H681>to<s%> their <S%H251>brethren:<s%> then they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>
At <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> did <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> him.
For <S%H5750>again<s%> the <S%H130>Edomites<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>smitten<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and carried <S%H7617>away<s%> <S%H7628>captives.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> also had <S%H6584>invaded<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the low <S%H8219>country,<s%> and of the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and had <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh,<s%> and <S%H357>Ajalon,<s%> and <S%H1450>Gederoth,<s%> and <S%H7755>Shocho<s%> with the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof, and <S%H8553>Timnah<s%> with the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof, <S%H1579>Gimzo<s%> also and the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof: and they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3665>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> low because <S%H5668>of<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he made Judah <S%H6544>naked,<s%> <S%H3063><s%> and <S%H4603>transgressed<s%> <S%H4604>sore<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H8407>Tiglath-pileser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> him, and <S%H6696>distressed<s%> him, but <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> him <S%H3808>not.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> took away a <S%H2505>portion<s%> out <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and of the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria:<s%> but he <S%H5833>helped<s%> him <S%H3808>not.<s%>

For he <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> unto the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> which <S%H5221>smote<s%> him: and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H5826>help<s%> them, therefore will I <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to them, that they may <S%H5826>help<s%> me. But <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> the <S%H3782>ruin<s%> of him, and of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and cut in <S%H7112>pieces<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and shut <S%H5462>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H4196>altars<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6438>corner<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
